title: Revert Back to the Legacy Client with these instructions! [PATCH 6.22]
body:
For anyone who wants to bypass the launching process of the Beta Client for respective reasons. 

- Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
- Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
- Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
- Save and launch League of Legends again.

It is imperative you avoid upgrading/switching to the Beta Client afterward.

Stay lit fam.

replies.body:
OMG, worked perfectly and fixed my client.

P.s. I was an alpha tester.
OMG I LOVE YOU MAN NO HOMO
Would this work with someone who alpha tested, for example?
if u have installed legacy Client already,your legacy client will open instead of alpha client each time you Run League of Legend :)
